description: Flame graphs are a visualization of hierarchical data, created to visualize stack traces of profiled software so that the most frequent code-paths to be identified quickly and accurately. They can be generated using my open source programs on github.com/brendangregg/FlameGraph, which create interactive SVGs. My colleague on the Netflix performance engineering team, Martin Spier, created an open source d3 version: d3-flame-graph.
author: Brendan Gregg
